= |area_code = |blank_name = |blank_info = |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |website = |footnotes = }} Abhar is a city in Zanjan province, northwestern Iran. In the year 2006 there were 55,266 people living there. == References == Category:Cities in Iran Category:Zanjan Province
